name: Fillet Blade

refinement_effect.refine_one: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 280% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 14s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 320% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 13s.
refinement_effect.refine_fourth: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 360% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 11s.

description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
